[b][color=white]Be Aware of Where You Post[/color][/b] 
Members should be aware of the sections that they are creating threads. Most recently a member was banned for posting about the value of BTC in the Coin Speak forum. For those unaware, one of the four rules that can be seen in the forum rules section state, "4. Do not use this forum category to post investment, pricing, or speculation."
 [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5700502&pid=55680666#pid55680666]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Would You Like to Be Interviewed?[/color][/b] 
Have you ever wanted to be interviewed for the Hack Forums news? Now is your chance! What are you waiting for? Come check out the [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5135277]Nomination and Request[/url] thread for your chance to get an interview with one of our team members. Know someone you think should partake in an interview? Why not recommend them now! [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5135277]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Support the Team![/color][/b] 
The truth is that even though our forum has over three million members, there are actually some people who don't even know we exist. If you would like to support the team there are countless things you could do. One of the simplest ways of doing so is by wearing our support signatures made by one of our support members, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3077324][color=white][b]Maxim[/b][/color][/url]. You can find those signatures in the second post of each news edition!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5696010][b][Influence] Official Graphic Help Desk | We Have YOUR Answers & More![/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1034038][b][color=white]Lukas[/color][/b][/url]
If you are looking for some help graphic wise, Influence has recently created a help desk in the Graphics forum.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5695186][b]A Brief History and Guide to American Politics[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2920830][b][color=white]Confound[/color][/b][/url]
Not everyone is into politics. Even if you are, there is something new you can learn everyday. Check out Confound's thread about American politics.

Need help with crypting? TheWarOwl made a help desk to help those in need. In addition, they are also providing assistance over Teamviewer!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5369306][b][Tutorial/Details] I.Q.D SQL Injection Method [knowledge By Sir benzi & Sir JaNuS1][/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3179306][b][color=#efefef]InjectorBoy[/color][/b][/url]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5697846][b][TUT] The solution to last Challenge Number 11[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3179306][b][color=#efefef]InjectorBoy[/color][/b][/url]
Another tutorial by InjectorBoy! This time with a solution to assist you in SQL injection.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5695473][b][Tut] Removing Telemetry Updates on Windows 7 [Tut][/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2993593][b][color=#efefef]v4p3[/color][/b][/url]
If telemetry updates annoy you, here is a way to turn them off.

[b][color=white]Site News Upgraded[/color][/b]
Next to the percentages, we've now included numerical values. Sometimes 2% isn't enough, we need to see that 1,337!

[b][color=white]What To Expect...[/color][/b]
Tested this once a while ago, bringing it back and hope this is found useful. If it is, let us know! If not, still let us know. ðŸ˜‘ðŸ¤®

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Having a bad job may be More Detrimental to Your Health Than not Having one at all[/color][/b] 
I'd recommend that you go check out the original article here, they have an interesting interview with the main researcher that I won't be able to include in full here. The title here was certainly something that piqued my interest. It seems fairly counter-intuitive at first but begins to make more and more sense after one gives it some thought. This study tracked 116 British adults who were unemployed between 2009 and 2010. Those that found "good" jobs, as defined by this study, obviously saw improvements in their stress levels. Those that acquired "bad" jobs reported across the board that they were far less stressed while searching. A Medical sociologist at the University of Manchester and author of this study added "I was trying to test the common assumption that any job is better than no job. I have been working on work, stress, and health for a number of years, and people accept that having a stressful job is not good for you physical and mental health. But most people then say, â€œbut at least you have a job,â€ with the implicit assumption that being unemployed is far worse for your health than having a stressful and poor quality job."   [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.researchgate.net/blog/post/having-a-bad-job-may-be-worse-for-your-health-than-having-no-job-at-all]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Elephant Dung Gives Insight Into Stress[/color][/b] 
This study looked to determine the influence of glucocorticoid metabolites on an elephant's body. These glucocorticoid metabolites are released when elephants undergo stressful situations, which is where the dung comes into play. Utilizing the dung is the first ethical method developed to measure these chemicals and their effect. Dr Sukumar and his team spent large amounts of time for elephants to defecate and leave the scene. They then would need to freeze-dry the dung to prevent degradation. This study eventually concluded that the stress levels of the studied elephants peaked when their resources were lowest in the summer. It also allowed them to rate the health of many elephants on a scale of 1-5.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-40950303]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/G4DefDi.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]North Korea Increases Meth Production in Response to Economic Sanctions[/color][/b] 
I imagine the news that North Korea was producing methamphetamine at all would be surprising to most people, as it was to me. However seized product has been traced back to North Korea. The increase in production is to offset losses from newly imposed sanctions from the United Nations which state North Korea  "shall not supply, sell or transfer coal, iron, iron ore, seafood, lead and lead ore to other countries." The report of the upturn in production originates from DailyNK; direct leads are fairly difficult to track down inside of North Korea though. It isn't only for external use either, that report claims. It says the drug is taking the impoverished nation by storm.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.talkingdrugs.org/north-korea-increasing-crystal-meth-production-to-economic-sanctions]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Steve Bannon Fired From White House[/color][/b] 
Newly instated White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders has confirmed that August 18 will be his last day in the White House. The brain behind Trump's "America first" campaign and who Trump attributed a large amount of his success on the campaign trail to has been ousted. Bannon was vastly criticized for harboring anti-Semitic and white supremacist views. He also tended to butt heads with a large amount of Trump's current cabinet.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-40980994]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/Jvg81mQ.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]An App That Warns, If Your Partner is Cheating on You[/color][/b]
On the off-chance that you have been utilizing Tinder while in a relationship, regardless of whether to physically undermine your accomplice or simply have a couple of swipes to check whether, despite everything you have it, you could be in a bad position. As indicated by The Independent, another application named Swipebuster enables you to scan for somebody on Tinder and see when they last swiped. 
One can tell their accomplice that they just did not erase their profile, but rather this application deals with that as well. 
This application will likewise demonstrate when you were last active.Swipebuster costs GBP 5.43 for three searches, and you should just put in the first name, age and likely area of your suspect. Swipebuster demands that it just exhibits data that is open on Tinder. You could contend that on the off chance that you have to utilize the application, there are some much more critical trust issues to address. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.gadgetsnow.com/tech-news/this-app-can-tell-if-your-partner-is-cheating-on-you/articleshow/60143553.cms]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Google Finally Enables Bluetooth Audio Streaming for Home Speakers[/color][/b]
Google has empowered Bluetooth audio streaming for Google Home, as indicated by Android Police. The component that was touted when the keen right hand (smart assistant) was declared at Google I/O back in May. Google empowered the component coincidentally back in June, yet it appears this time everything is authentic. 
The update implies Google Home owners can stream neighborhood music, podcasts, and gushing services that may not be upheld by Home to their speakers voluntarily. Nonetheless, it may not be that incredible for individuals needing flawless sound quality, as users are whining about the notable lag over the connection. 
The update is purportedly taking off continuously, so everybody ought to include it inside the following couple of days. To enact Bluetooth audio streaming head to settings in the Home application, tap Paired Bluetooth devices and combined your gadget to the Home speaker. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2017/8/19/16167886/google-home-bluetooth-audio-streaming-active]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]New Sword Art Online Game Coming to PC[/color][/b] 
If you are a fan of the Sword Art Online series, a new game is currently in the process of being made for the PC, Xbox One, and PS4. This will be the first ever SAO game series for the PC. The developers at Bandai Namco revealed a little teaser announcing the game which they claimed to have titled, "#Projekt1514". Do not get your hopes up just yet because the game will not be released until 2018. Some information known about the game right now is that it will be a third person action game. What the game content will consist of is sadly unknown. One question to think about is whether or not it will be different than the games released on PlayStation devices. In total, four different Sword Art Online games have been created and released for PlayStation devices. If you are looking to dive into the world of virtual reality, stay tuned for more information in the future. In addition, check out a gameplay trailer [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vmVw1gSB8t4]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/bandai-namco-teases-mysterious-projekt1514/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Yakuza 6 Release Date Revealed[/color][/b] 
It seems like all the games people are waiting for will be released next year. Of course, we cannot say that about every game. However, this game is a very popular game that is based off the Japanese Yakuza. Well, the name of the game is Yakuza 6. The game will be available outside of Asia in March of next year. That may seem like a lightyear away for some, but the wait might be just worth it. In addition, if you are a hardcore fan of the series or would like to purchase a special edition, there will be an option to do so upon the release. It will cost you a little more money (which is no surprise), and the price will increase from $60 to $90 for a copy of the special edition. Since this is technically a new release for these countries, pre-orders will be available if you would like to make one. If you do this, you will receive a hard art booklet that surrounds the casing in which the game will be in. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/yakuza-6-release-date-revealed/1100-6452631/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Pokemon Ultra Sun And Ultra Moon's: More Details About What's Different[/color][/b] 
Descriptions about some of the changes that will be happening in the new Pokemon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon have been released in a small trailer that Pokemon posted on their YouTube channel. The first thing that will be updated in the game is the look of the characters. Each avatar in the game will have updated names, stories behind them, and their clothing. That should be expected, right? More information about the new form of Rockruff's evolution Dusk Form Lycanroc was also mentioned in the video. One thing that stood out to most people was an image of the map. Although the map of Alola stayed the same in terms of the islands that will be playable, what is different was the use of clouds and a dark atmosphere. In Sun and Moon, you had beautiful sunny skies during the day and breathtaking sights of the stars at night. Now, you have storm clouds surrounding all the islands which may foreshadow a dark presence. In addition, if you were a fan of the new Z-Moves that were introduced in Sun and Moon, they will be making a return in Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon with new Z-type moves being introduced. How cool is that! The game will be released in November and if you are an impatient person, you can pick up a remastered version of the original Pokemon Gold and Silver games in September via the Nintendo eShop. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/pokemon-ultra-sun-and-ultra-moons-new-trailer-reve/1100-6452633/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center]Gaming Video of the Week[sp]

[yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TnmI8Gd94kk[/yt][/sp][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/ctcHVCW.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Fappening 2017?[/color][/b] 
More celebrities are victims of the "fappening". A plethora of photos were leaked online of various different celebrities you might not have expected to have these photos on their phone. The list includes celebrities like Anne Hathaway, Demi Lovato, Tiger Woods, and even Miley Cyrus. Most of the photos showcased the celebrities during intimate times and were dumped on a website which will not be disclosed in this article. At the current time, lawyers of the celebrities are doing their best to get these photos taken off the internet. The original fappening happened back in 2014, where hackers used phishing tactics to get access into the accounts. Those responsible for this leak are currently unknown. [i][size=x-small][url=http://thehackernews.com/2017/08/frappening-celebrity-photos.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Enigma Hacked[/color][/b] 
Engima is currently one of the most popular platforms to invest and trade into the cryptocurrency Etherium. An anonymous hacker was able to hack into the website and steal over $470,000 worth of the Etherium coin. When you visit the website, you are prompted with a big message informing whoever is viewing the website about the situation and that you should avoid sending funds at the moment. In addition, the hacker also got access to their newsletter email account. With that being said, the hacker sent out fake emails to users to hopefully gain some more coins. The email was very convincing and told the user that Enigma was opening up presales for tokens that you could then pay to the hacker's address. No information was posted on how this hacker got in and Engima's security team are unaware of how the systems were breached either. [i][size=x-small][url=http://thehackernews.com/2017/08/enigma-cryptocurrency-hack.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
